metadata.title: Rafael Rodriguez - Fullstack Developer
metadata.description: Computer Engineer and Fullstack Developer specializing in building modern, scalable web applications. Experienced in React, Next.js, Node.js, and TypeScript — from clean frontends to robust backend APIs.

hero.tagline: Computer Sciences Engineer crafting scalable and modern web applications
hero.aboutParagraph1: I specialize in turning ideas into digital products that perform and can be measured: clear interfaces, optimized user flows, and metrics that demonstrate real impact. I work across both frontend and backend to ensure user experience and business objectives move in the same direction.
hero.aboutParagraph2: Every delivery is focused on tangible outcomes — higher conversions, reduced friction, and lower maintenance costs — supported by modern development practices and observability. I collaborate with cross-functional teams to prioritize what truly adds value and to ship improvements iteratively.

about.heading: About Me
about.paragraph1: I specialize in bringing ideas to life through high-performance applications that drive real business results. With a primary focus on front end development and extensive backend experience, I create tailored solutions designed to boost conversions and meet your specific business objectives.
about.paragraph2: Every business is unique, and so are my solutions. I deliver personalized digital experiences using modern technologies, with a strong emphasis on Core Web Vitals and business metrics, translating your goals into measurable outcomes.
